verses.name: Deuteronomy 2:1
verses.text: Then we turned, and took our journey into the wilderness by the way of the Red sea, as the Lord spake unto me: and we compassed mount Seir many days.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 2:2
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto me, saying,

verses.name: Deuteronomy 2:3
verses.text: Ye have compassed this mountain long enough: turn you northward.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 2:4
verses.text: And command thou the people, saying, Ye are to pass through the coast of your brethren the children of Esau, which dwell in Seir; and they shall be afraid of you: take ye good heed unto yourselves therefore:
